rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that aligns with Vastu principles for energy flow and a welcoming atmosphere.
Modern minimalist living area with large glass openings to the garden, promoting natural light and ventilation.
A functional dining space integrated into the living area or adjacent for easy access during meals.
Open plan kitchen designed with minimalistic features and sustainable materials. Includes a pantry and utility spaces.
A guest room equipped with modern amenities to provide comfort while maintaining an airy layout.
Well-appointed bathroom with a contemporary design; includes necessary fixtures and ample storage space.
A dedicated space for cleaning supplies and equipment, ensuring minimal intrusion into living areas.

openings.description: A secure entrance door with reinforced framing and integrated security features.
Large windows in the living area offering panoramic views of the garden while enhancing natural light.
A subtle window placement providing light and ventilation to the dining space.
Kitchen windows that facilitate ample daylight while ensuring privacy.

rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with ample space for a walk-in closet and private balcony overlooking the garden, following Vastu recommendations.
Spacious secondary bedroom designed to maintain privacy while offering modern minimalist aesthetics.
Additional bedroom ensuring sufficient space for the family's needs.
Another comfortable bedroom that adheres to minimalist design principles.
A dedicated study and office area designed with a focus on natural light and a quiet environment.

openings.description: Balcony providing an outdoor view and fresh air for the master bedroom.
Skylight that enhances natural illumination and energy efficiency in the study area.
